topic.title: Show Comments and Tracked Changes in PDF Output

keywords.indexterm: DITAOutputPDF output customizationShow comments and tracked changes
DITAPDF output customizationShow comments and tracked changes

body.p: To make comments and tracked changes (stored within your DITA topics) appear in the PDF output, follow these steps:

ol.li: Click the Configure Transformation Scenario(s) button from the Dita Maps Manager toolbar.
Select DITA Map PDF and click the Edit button (or use the Duplicate button if your framework is read-only).
In the Parameters tab, set the value of the show.changes.and.comments parameter to yes.

Click OK and then the Apply Associated button to run the transformation scenario.
Result: Comment threads and tracked changes will now appear in the PDF output. Details about each comment or change will be available in the footer section for each page.
